发现通过大脑变化缓解疼痛的大自然暴露一项新的神经影像学研究表明，观察性质可以通过减少与疼痛感知相关的大脑活动来帮助缓解人们的疼痛。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/nature-exposure-found-found-to-alleviate-pain-pain-pain-through-brain-brain-changes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/nature-exposure-found-found-to-alleviate-pain-pain-pain-through-brain-brain-changes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=df346ff5-f449-449-4480-9c50-6812fb8ebb50 Thu, 13 Mar 2025 08:18:23 -0400 Nature exposure found to alleviate pain through brain changes
研究人员开发了新化合物来治疗脱发Areata由IOCB Prague的Pavel Majer博士领导的研究小组与Johns Hopkins University的Barbara Slusher和Louis Garza的实验室合作开发了一种化合物，可以潜在地治疗自身免疫性疾病脱发Areata，这会导致脱发导致毛发损失，从而导致鲍德贴片的形成。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/researchers-develop-new-new-compound-to-to-to-to-to-treat-alopecia-areata.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/researchers-develop-new-new-new-compound-to-to-to-to-to-treat-alopecia-areata.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eda6ae05-3d36-4666-b415-d22952e461b7 Thu, 13 Mar 2025 08:07:00 -0400 Researchers develop new compound to treat alopecia areata

Biovectra荣获2025年CDMO生物制剂奖Agilent Technologies Inc.的一部分Biovectra是北美领先的CDMO，专门研究生物制剂，mRNA疗法和复杂的化学，自豪地宣布，它是2025年外包Pharma CDMO领导力奖中生物学类别的获得者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/biovectra-is-honored-with-2025-cdmo-leadership-award-award-for biologics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/biovectra-is-honored-with-2025-cdmo-leadership-award-for-biologics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4bbde47c-25e6-47e6-b0e6-b0e6-ea9739d8b20a Thu, 13 Mar 2025 00:43:00 -0400 BIOVECTRA is honored with 2025 CDMO Leadership Award for biologics
